text:
@ANI Wow !
Thanks to @narendramodi ji's #LockdownIndia atleast in this, we are ahead of #China 

But wait......

Isn't it a Bad News 🤔

Some experts were predicting that if #Lockdown is continued then India may come out of COVID19 by 16th May 2020, but things happening other way...
